trans-unit.source: The <u>F</u>ile menu gives the users the possibility to edit an existing file, or save a new or modified file, and exit the application.

trans-unit.source: The Replica Compiler (repc) generates QObject header files based on an API definition file. The file (called a "rep" file) uses a specific (text) syntax to describe the API. By convention, these files are given a .rep file extension, short for Replica. When these files are processed by repc, repc generates both Source and Replica header files.
trans-unit.target: 的代表 LICA Ç ompiler（REPC）生成的QObject根据API定义文件的头文件。该文件（称为“ rep”文件）使用特定的（文本）语法来描述API。按照惯例，这些文件的文件扩展名为.rep，是副本服务器的缩写。当这些文件由repc处理时，repc会同时生成源和副本头文件。

trans-unit.source: The API can be identified by the QPlatform* class prefix, and is used for implementing higher level classes typically found in Qt GUI, e.g. QPlatformWindow for window system integration exposed through QWindow, or QPlatformTheme for deeper platform theming and integration, exposed through QStyleHint and QStyle.
trans-unit.target: 该API可以通过被识别 QPlatform* 类前缀，以及用于实现典型地在发现更高级别的类Qt的GUI，例如 QPlatformWindow 用于通过暴露窗口系统集成QWindow，或 QPlatformTheme 对于较深的平台主题化和整合，通过QStyleHint并暴露将QStyle。

trans-unit.source: The API consists of over 20 effects provided as separate QML types. The effects cover functional areas such as blending, masking, blurring, coloring, and many more.
trans-unit.target: 该API由20多种效果组成,作为独立的QML类型提供。这些效果涵盖了诸如混合、蒙版、模糊、着色等功能领域。

trans-unit.source: The API for deep linking in StackView is the same as for basic navigation. Pushing an array instead of a single item adds all the items in that array to the stack. The transition animation, however, is applied only for the last item in the array. The normal semantics of push() apply for deep linking, that is, it adds whatever is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: StackView中用于深层链接的API 与基本导航相同。推送数组而不是单个项目会将该数组中的所有项目添加到堆栈中。但是，过渡动画仅应用于数组中的最后一项。push（）的常规语义适用于深层链接，即，它将被推送的内容添加到堆栈中。

trans-unit.source: The API for deep linking in StackView is the same as for basic navigation. Pushing an array instead of a single item, will involve that all the items in that array will be pushed onto the stack. The transition animation, however, will be conducted as if only the last item in the array was pushed onto the stack. The normal semantics of push() apply for deep linking, meaning that push() adds whatever is pushed onto the stack. Note also that only the last item of the array will be loaded. The rest will be lazy-loaded as needed when entering the screen upon subsequent calls to pop (or when requesting the item by using
trans-unit.target: StackView中用于深层链接的API 与基本导航相同。推入数组而不是单个项目将涉及将该数组中的所有项目推入堆栈。但是，将执行过渡动画，就像仅将数组中的最后一项推入堆栈一样。push（）的常规语义适用于深层链接，这意味着push（）会将被压入的内容添加到堆栈中。另请注意，仅将加载数组的最后一项。在后续调用pop时进入屏幕时（或通过使用来请求该项目时），其余的将根据需要延迟加载。

trans-unit.source: The API for deep linking in StackView is the same as for basic navigation. Pushing an array instead of a single item adds all the items in that array to the stack. The transition animation, however, is applied only for the last item in the array. The normal semantics of push() apply for deep linking, that is, it adds whatever is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: StackView中用于深层链接的API与基本导航相同。推入数组而不是单个项目会将该数组中的所有项目添加到堆栈中。但是，过渡动画仅应用于数组中的最后一项。push（）的常规语义适用于深层链接，也就是说，它将被推送的内容添加到堆栈中。

trans-unit.source: The API for deep linking in StackView is the same as for basic navigation. Pushing an array instead of a single item, will involve that all the items in that array will be pushed onto the stack. The transition animation, however, will be conducted as if only the last item in the array was pushed onto the stack. The normal semantics of push() apply for deep linking, meaning that push() adds whatever is pushed onto the stack. Note also that only the last item of the array will be loaded. The rest will be lazy-loaded as needed when entering the screen upon subsequent calls to pop (or when requesting the item by using
trans-unit.target: StackView中用于深层链接的API与基本导航相同。推入数组而不是单个项目将涉及将该数组中的所有项目推入堆栈。但是，将执行过渡动画，就像仅将数组中的最后一项推入堆栈一样。push（）的常规语义适用于深层链接，这意味着push（）会将被压入的内容添加到堆栈中。另请注意，仅将加载数组的最后一项。后续调用pop时进入屏幕时（或通过使用来请求项目时），其余部分将根据需要延迟加载

trans-unit.source: The API in Detail
trans-unit.target: API详细介绍

trans-unit.source: The API is similar to that of views like ListView and PathView; a model and delegate can be set, and the count and currentItem properties provide read-only access to information about the view. To position the view at a certain index, use positionViewAtIndex().
trans-unit.target: 该API与ListView和PathView之类的视图相似；一个模型和代表可以被设置，并且计数和CURRENTITEM属性提供只读至约视图信息的访问。要将视图定位在某个索引处，请使用positionViewAtIndex（）。

trans-unit.source: The API is similar to that of views like ListView and PathView; a model and delegate can be set, and the count and currentItem properties provide read-only access to information about the view. To position the view at a certain index, use positionViewAtIndex().

trans-unit.source: The API is split into sub-modules, which provide QML and C++ interfaces for specific purposes. They focus mainly on Map and Place information. The required position data can be retrieved using the QtPositioning module.
trans-unit.target: 该API分为多个子模块，这些子模块为特定目的提供QML和C ++接口。他们主要关注地图和地方信息。可以使用QtPositioning模块检索所需的位置数据。

trans-unit.source: The API of QStyle contains functions that draw the widgets, static helper functions to do common and difficult tasks (e.g., calculating the position of slider handles) and functions to do the various calculations necessary while drawing (e.g., for the widgets to calculate their size hints). The style also helps some widgets with the layout of their contents. In addition, it creates a QPalette that contains QBrushes to draw with.
trans-unit.target: QStyle的API 包含绘制小部件的功能，用于执行常见和困难任务的静态辅助功能（例如，计算滑块手柄的位置）以及在绘制时进行各种必要的计算的功能（例如，用于小部件来计算其尺寸）提示）。该样式还可以帮助某些小部件调整其内容的布局。此外，它还创建了一个QPalette，其中包含要绘制的QBrush es。

trans-unit.source: The API of Qt Quick Controls 2 aims to be clean and simple. Common operations are easy, and more advanced ones are liberally documented with snippets that can be copied into your code.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick Controls 2的API力求简洁明了。普通的操作很简单,更多的高级操作也有大量的文档,可以复制到你的代码中。

trans-unit.source: The API of Qt Quick Controls 2 is very similar to Qt Quick Controls 1, but it does come with some changes necessary to facilitate the improvements. The majority of changes are to do with styling; all of a control's delegates are now accessible in the control itself, instead of in a separate style object.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick Controls 2的API与Qt Quick Controls 1非常相似,但它也有一些必要的改进。大部分的变化都与样式有关;现在控件的所有委托都可以在控件本身中访问,而不是在一个单独的样式对象中。

trans-unit.source: The API of Qt Quick Controls aims to be clean and simple. Common operations are easy, and more advanced ones are liberally documented with snippets that can be copied into your code.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick Controls的API力求简洁明了。普通的操作很简单,更高级的操作也有大量的文档,可以复制到你的代码中。

trans-unit.source: The API of Qt Quick Controls is very similar to Qt Quick Controls 1, but it does come with some changes necessary to facilitate the improvements. The majority of changes are to do with styling; all of a control's delegates are now accessible in the control itself, instead of in a separate style object.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick Controls的API与Qt Quick Controls 1非常相似,但它也有一些必要的改进。大部分的变化都与样式有关;现在控件的所有委托都可以在控件本身中访问,而不是在一个单独的样式对象中。

trans-unit.source: The API of the STL iterators is modelled on pointers in an array. For example, the ++ operator advances the iterator to the next item, and the * operator returns the item that the iterator points to. In fact, for QList and QStack, which store their items at adjacent memory positions, the iterator type is just a typedef for T *, and the const_iterator type is just a typedef for const T *.
trans-unit.target: STL迭代器的API以数组中的指针为模型。例如， ++ 运算符将迭代器前进到下一个项目，而 * 运算符将返回迭代器指向的项目。实际上，对于将项存储在相邻内存位置的QList和QStack而言，迭代器类型只是 T * 的typedef ，而const_iterator类型只是 const T * 的typedef 。

trans-unit.source: The API of the STL iterators is modelled on pointers in an array. For example, the ++ operator advances the iterator to the next item, and the * operator returns the item that the iterator points to. In fact, for QVector and QStack, which store their items at adjacent memory positions, the iterator type is just a typedef for T *, and the const_iterator type is just a typedef for const T *.
trans-unit.target: STL迭代器的API以数组中的指针为模型。例如， ++ 运算符将迭代器前进到下一个项目，而 * 运算符将返回迭代器指向的项目。实际上，对于将其项存储在相邻内存位置的QVector和QStack而言，迭代器类型只是 T * 的typedef ，而const_iterator类型只是 const T * 的typedef 。

trans-unit.source: The ASCII Compatible Encoding (ACE) is defined by RFC 3490, RFC 3491 and RFC 3492. It is part of the Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA) specification, which allows for domain names (like "example.com") to be written using international characters.
trans-unit.target: ASCII兼容编码（ACE）由RFC 3490，RFC 3491和RFC 3492定义。它是应用程序中国际化域名（IDNA）规范的一部分，该规范允许写入域名（如 "example.com" ）使用国际字符。

trans-unit.source: The ASCII-Compatible Encoding (ACE) is defined by RFC 3490, RFC 3491 and RFC 3492. It is part of the Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA) specification, which allows for domain names (like "example.com") to be written using international characters.

trans-unit.source: The AbstractTexture class shouldn't be used directly but rather through one of its subclasses. Each subclass implements a given texture target (2D, 2DArray, 3D, CubeMap ...) Each subclass provides a set of functors for each layer, cube map face and mipmap level. In turn the backend uses those functor to properly fill a corresponding OpenGL texture with data. It is expected the functor does as minimal processing as possible so as not to slow down textures generation and upload. If the content of a texture is the result of a slow procedural generation process, it is recommended not to implement this directly in a functor.
trans-unit.target: AbstractTexture类不应该被直接使用,而是通过它的一个子类。每个子类都实现了一个给定的纹理目标(2D,2DArray,3D,CubeMap ...)每个子类都为每个图层、立方体贴图面和mipmap层提供了一组漏斗。反过来,后端使用这些漏斗来正确地用数据填充相应的OpenGL纹理。我们希望漏斗器尽可能地进行最小化处理,以免拖慢纹理的生成和上传。如果纹理的内容是一个缓慢的程序生成过程的结果,建议不要直接在一个functor中实现。

trans-unit.source: The ActiveX server could not shut down properly when the last client stopped using it. It usually takes about two seconds for the application to terminate, but you might have to use the task manager to kill the process (e.g. when a client doesn't release the controls properly).
trans-unit.target: 当最后一个客户端停止使用ActiveX服务器时,ActiveX服务器无法正常关闭。通常情况下,应用程序终止需要大约两秒钟的时间,但你可能不得不使用任务管理器来杀死该进程(例如,当客户端没有正确释放控件时)。

trans-unit.source: The Address has a text property which holds a formatted string. It is the recommended way to display an address to the user and typically takes the format of an address as found on an envelope, but this is not always the case. The text may be automatically generated from constituent address properties such as street, city and and so on, but can also be explicitly assigned. See text for details.
trans-unit.target: 该地址具有一个文本属性，其中包含格式化的字符串。建议向用户显示地址，通常采用信封上的地址格式，但这并不总是这样。的文本可以从构成地址性质，例如自动生成街道，城市和等，但也可以显式分配。有关详细信息，请参见文本。

trans-unit.source: The Animation type cannot be used directly in a QML file. It exists to provide a set of common properties and methods, available across all the other animation types that inherit from it. Attempting to use the Animation type directly will result in an error.

trans-unit.source: The Balsam tool also has support for converting projects created with Qt 3D Studio into Qt Quick 3D QML projects.
trans-unit.target: Balsam工具还支持将使用Qt 3D Studio创建的项目转换为Qt Quick 3D QML项目。

trans-unit.source: The Balsam tool is a command line application that is part of Qt Quick 3D's asset conditioning pipeline. The purpose is to take assets created in digital content creation tools like Maya, 3ds Max, or Blender and convert them into an efficient runtime format for use with Qt Quick 3D. It is not possible, nor does it make sense to reference the interchange formats directly in applications because a large amount of resources are needed to parse and condition the content of the asset before it is usable for realtime rendering. Instead the interchange formats can be converted via the Balsam tool into QML Components and resources like geometry and textures.
trans-unit.target: Balsam工具是一个命令行应用程序，是Qt Quick 3D资产调节管道的一部分。目的是获取在Maya，3ds Max或Blender等数字内容创建工具中创建的资产，并将其转换为可与Qt Quick 3D结合使用的高效运行时格式。这是不可能的，直接在应用程序中引用交换格式也没有意义，因为需要大量资源来解析和调整资产的内容，然后才能将其用于实时呈现。相反，可以通过Balsam工具将交换格式转换为QML组件以及诸如几何图形和纹理之类的资源。

trans-unit.source: The Basic style is a simple and light-weight style that offers the maximum performance for Qt Quick Controls. It is built with a minimal amount of Qt Quick primitives, and keeps animations and transitions to the minimum.
trans-unit.target: Basic风格是一种简单而轻量级的风格,它为Qt Quick控件提供了最大的性能。它是用最少的Qt Quick基元构建的,并将动画和过渡保持在最低限度。

trans-unit.source: The Bearer Management API controls the system's connectivity state. This incorporates simple information such as whether the device is online and how many interfaces there are as well as enables the application developer to start, stop network interfaces and influences other connection specific details. Depending on the platform's capabilities it may even provide session management so that a network interface remains up for as long as clients have a registered interest in them while at the same time optimizes the interface's uptime.
trans-unit.target: Bearer Management API控制系统的连接状态。这包括简单的信息,如设备是否在线,有多少个接口,以及使应用程序开发人员能够启动、停止网络接口和影响其他连接的具体细节。根据平台的能力,它甚至可以提供会话管理,这样只要客户对网络接口有注册的兴趣,网络接口就能保持在线,同时优化接口的正常运行时间。

trans-unit.source: The Big5 codec provides conversion to and from the Big5 encoding. The code was originally contributed by Ming-Che Chuang <mingche@cobra.ee.ntu.edu.tw> for the Big-5+ encoding, and was included in Qt with the author's permission, and the grateful thanks of the Qt team. (Note: Ming-Che's code is QPL'd, as per an mail to qt-info@nokia.com.)
trans-unit.target: Big5编解码器提供与Big5编码之间的转换。该代码最初是由Ming-Che Chuang <mingche@cobra.ee.ntu.edu.tw>为Big-5 +编码而编写的，并在得到作者许可的情况下被包含在Qt中，并感谢Qt团队。（注意：Ming-Che的代码是QPL，请发送至qt-info@nokia.com。）

trans-unit.source: The Big5 is currently implemented as a pure subset of the Big5-HKSCS codec, so more fine-tuning is needed to make it identical to the standard Big5 mapping as determined by Li18nux-Big5. See http://www.autrijus.org/xml/ for the draft Big5 (2002) standard.
trans-unit.target: Big5当前被实现为Big5-HKSCS编解码器的纯子集，因此需要更多的微调以使其与Li18nux-Big5确定的标准Big5映射相同。有关Big5（2002）标准草案，请参见http://www.autrijus.org/xml/。

trans-unit.source: The C++ QWebChannel API makes it possible to talk to any HTML client, which could run on a local or even remote machine. The only limitation is that the HTML client supports the JavaScript features used by qwebchannel.js. As such, one can interact with basically any modern HTML browser or standalone JavaScript runtime, such as node.js.
trans-unit.target: C ++ QWebChannel API使与任何HTML客户端进行对话成为可能，该客户端可以在本地甚至远程计算机上运行。唯一的限制是HTML客户端支持 qwebchannel.js 使用的JavaScript功能。因此，基本上可以与任何现代HTML浏览器或独立的JavaScript运行时（例如node.js）进行交互。

trans-unit.source: The C++ QWebChannel API makes it possible to talk to any HTML client, which could run on a local or even remote machine. The only limitation is that the HTML client supports the JavaScript features used by qwebchannel.js. As such, one can interact with basically any modern HTML browser or standalone JavaScript runtime, such as node.js.
trans-unit.target: C ++ QWebChannel API使得可以与任何HTML客户端进行对话，而这些HTML客户端可以在本地甚至远程计算机上运行。唯一的限制是HTML客户端支持 qwebchannel.js 使用的JavaScript功能。因此，基本上可以与任何现代HTML浏览器或独立的JavaScript运行时（例如node.js）进行交互。

trans-unit.source: The CBOR date/time types are extension types using tags: either a string (in ISO date format) tagged as a DateTime or a number (of seconds since the start of 1970, UTC) tagged as a UnixTime_t. When parsing CBOR streams, QCborValue will convert UnixTime_t to the string-based type.
trans-unit.target: CBOR日期/时间类型是使用标签的扩展类型：标记为DateTime的字符串（ISO日期格式）或标记为UnixTime_t的数字（自1970年以来的秒数，UTC）。当解析CBOR流，QCborValue将转换UnixTime_t到基于字符串类型。

trans-unit.source: The CBOR date/time types are extension types using tags: either a string (in ISO date format) tagged as a DateTime or a number (of seconds since the start of 1970, UTC) tagged as a UnixTime_t. When parsing CBOR streams, QCborValue will convert UnixTime_t to the string-based type.
trans-unit.target: CBOR日期/时间类型是使用标签的扩展类型：标记为DateTime的字符串（ISO日期格式）或标记为UnixTime_t的数字（自1970年UTC开始以秒为单位）。当解析CBOR流，QCborValue将转换UnixTime_t到基于字符串类型。

trans-unit.target: CBOR正则表达式类型是由标记为RegularExpression的字符串表示的扩展类型。请注意，CBOR正则表达式仅存储模式，因此QRegularExpression对象可能携带的任何标志都将丢失。

trans-unit.source: The CandlestickSeries type acts as a container for single candlestick items. Each item is drawn to its own category when using BarCategoryAxis. DateTimeAxis and ValueAxis can be used as an alternative to BarCategoryAxis. In this case, each candlestick item is drawn according to its timestamp value.

trans-unit.source: The Canvas item allows drawing of straight and curved lines, simple and complex shapes, graphs, and referenced graphic images. It can also add text, colors, shadows, gradients, and patterns, and do low level pixel operations. The Canvas output may be saved as an image file or serialized to a URL.
trans-unit.target: Canvas项目可以绘制直线和曲线、简单和复杂的形状、图形和参考图形图像。它还可以添加文字、颜色、阴影、渐变和图案,并进行低级像素操作。Canvas的输出可以保存为图像文件或序列化为一个URL。

trans-unit.source: The Canvas item supports two render targets: Canvas.Image and Canvas.FramebufferObject.
trans-unit.target: Canvas项支持两个渲染目标： Canvas.Image 和 Canvas.FramebufferObject 。

trans-unit.source: The Canvas.FramebufferObject render target utilizes OpenGL hardware acceleration rather than rendering into system memory, which in many cases results in faster rendering. Canvas.FramebufferObject relies on the OpenGL extensions GL_EXT_framebuffer_multisample and GL_EXT_framebuffer_blit for antialiasing. It will also use more graphics memory when rendering strategy is anything other than Canvas.Cooperative. Framebuffer objects may not be available with Qt Quick backends other than OpenGL.
trans-unit.target: Canvas.FramebufferObject渲染目标利用OpenGL硬件加速，而不是渲染到系统内存中，在许多情况下，渲染速度更快。Canvas.FramebufferObject依靠OpenGL扩展 GL_EXT_framebuffer_multisample 和 GL_EXT_framebuffer_blit 进行抗锯齿。当渲染策略不是Canvas.Cooperative时，它将使用更多的图形内存。除OpenGL外，Qt Quick后端可能不提供帧缓冲对象。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasImageData object has the actual dimensions of the data stored in this object and holds the one-dimensional array containing the data in RGBA order, as integers in the range 0 to 255.
trans-unit.target: CanvasImageData对象具有存储在该对象中的数据的实际尺寸,并持有包含数据的一维数组,按RGBA顺序排列,为0~255范围内的整数。

trans-unit.source: The CanvasImageData object holds the image pixel data.

trans-unit.source: The CanvasPixelArray object provides ordered, indexed access to the color components of each pixel of the image data. The CanvasPixelArray can be accessed as normal Javascript array.
trans-unit.target: CanvasPixelArray对象提供了对图像数据中每个像素的颜色分量的有序、索引访问。CanvasPixelArray可以作为普通的Javascript数组来访问。

trans-unit.source: The ChromaticAberration effect simulates an imperfection of optical lenses. In real life, chromatic aberration is an optical phenomenon causing color fringes in high contrast areas. These color fringes are caused by different colors refracting at different angles splitting white light into a spectrum. This is called dispersion.
trans-unit.target: 色差效应模拟的是光学镜头的不完美。在现实生活中,色差是一种光学现象,会在高对比度的区域造成色斑。这些色差是由于不同颜色的光从不同角度折射,将白光分割成一个光谱造成的。这就是所谓的色散。

trans-unit.source: The Chromium DevTools page can also be shown within the application. To set this up, you can call either QWebEnginePage::setInspectedPage() to the page to be inspected, which implicitly loads the DevTools into the this page, or QWebEnginePage::setDevToolsPage() to let the this page be inspected.
trans-unit.target: Chromium DevTools页面也可以在应用程序中显示。要这样设置，你可以调用QWebEnginePage :: setInspectedPage（）的页面进行检查，其中隐含加载DevTools进入 this 页面，或QWebEnginePage :: setDevToolsPage（）让 this 页面进行检查。

trans-unit.source: The Command pattern is based on the idea that all editing in an application is done by creating instances of command objects. Command objects apply changes to the document and are stored on a command stack. Furthermore, each command knows how to undo its changes to bring the document back to its previous state. As long as the application only uses command objects to change the state of the document, it is possible to undo a sequence of commands by traversing the stack downwards and calling undo on each command in turn. It is also possible to redo a sequence of commands by traversing the stack upwards and calling redo on each command.
trans-unit.target: 命令模式基于这样的理念:应用程序中的所有编辑都是通过创建命令对象的实例来完成的。命令对象将更改应用到文档中,并存储在命令栈中。此外,每个命令都知道如何撤销它的更改,使文档恢复到以前的状态。只要应用程序只使用命令对象来改变文档的状态,就可以通过向下遍历堆栈并依次对每个命令调用undo来撤销一连串的命令。也可以通过向上遍历堆栈并对每个命令调用redo来重做一个命令序列。

trans-unit.source: The Command type should not be instantiated by itself, but only exists as a polymorphic supertype for the different actions that can be performed as part of a render pass.
trans-unit.target: Command类型不应单独实例化，而应作为可作为渲染过程一部分执行的不同操作的多态超类型而存在。

trans-unit.source: The Core profile does not include any of the functions that were removed in OpenGL 3.1. The Compatibility profile contains all functions in the Core profile of the same version plus all of the functions that were removed in OpenGL 3.1. In this way the Compatibility profile classes allow use of newer OpenGL functionality but also allows you to keep using your legacy OpenGL code. For new OpenGL code the Core profile should be preferred.
trans-unit.target: 核心配置文件不包含OpenGL 3.1中删除的任何功能。兼容性配置文件包含同一版本的Core配置文件中的所有功能以及OpenGL 3.1中删除的所有功能。通过这种方式,兼容性配置文件类允许您使用较新的OpenGL功能,但也允许您继续使用传统的OpenGL代码。对于新的OpenGL代码,应首选Core profile。

trans-unit.source: The D3D12 adaptation can keep multiple frames in flight, similar to modern game engines. This is somewhat different from the traditional "render - swap - wait for vsync" model and allows for better GPU utilization at the expense of higher resource use. This means that the renderer will be a number of frames ahead of what is displayed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: D3D12适配可以保持多帧飞行,类似于现代游戏引擎。这与传统的 "渲染-交换-等待vsync "模式有些不同,它可以以更高的资源使用为代价,提高GPU的利用率。这意味着渲染器将比屏幕上显示的内容提前若干帧。

trans-unit.source: The D3D12 backend also introduces support for pre-compiled shaders. All the backend's own shaders (used by the built-in materials on which the Rectangle, Image, Text, and other QML types are built with) are compiled to D3D shader bytecode when you compile Qt. Applications using ShaderEffect items can choose to ship bytecode either in regular files, via the Qt resource system, or use High Level Shading Language for DirectX (HLSL) source strings. Unlike OpenGL, the compilation for HLSL is properly threaded, meaning shader compilation won't block the application and its user interface.
trans-unit.target: D3D12后端还引入了对预编译着色器的支持。编译Qt时，所有后端自己的着色器（由用于构建Rectangle，Image，Text和其他QML类型的内置材料使用）将编译为D3D着色器字节码。使用ShaderEffect项的应用程序可以选择通过Qt资源系统将字节码发送到常规文件中，也可以使用DirectX（HLSL）源字符串的高级着色语言。与OpenGL不同，HLSL的编译是正确进行线程处理的，这意味着着色器编译不会阻塞应用程序及其用户界面。

trans-unit.source: The DB2 header and include files should already be installed in the right directories. You just have to build the plugin as follows:
trans-unit.target: DB2头文件和包含文件应该已经安装在正确的目录中。你只需要按照以下方式构建插件。

trans-unit.source: The DBus bus allows calling a method on a given remote object without specifying the destination interface, if the method name is unique. However, if two interfaces on the remote object export the same method name, the result is undefined (one of the two may be called or an error may be returned).
trans-unit.target: DBus总线允许在给定的远程对象上调用一个方法,而不指定目的接口,如果方法名是唯一的。但是,如果远程对象上的两个接口导出了相同的方法名,则结果是未定义的(可能调用两个接口中的一个,也可能返回一个错误)。

trans-unit.source: The Declarative State Machine Framework
trans-unit.target: 声明式状态机框架

trans-unit.source: The Declarative State Machine Framework provides types for creating and executing state graphs in QML. It is similar to the C++ State Machine framework based on Harel's Statecharts: A visual formalism for complex systems, which is also the basis for UML state diagrams. Like its C++ counterpart, the framework provides an API and execution model based on State Chart XML (SCXML) to embed the elements and semantics of statecharts in QML applications.
trans-unit.target: 声明性状态机框架提供了用于在QML中创建和执行状态图的类型。它类似于基于Harel的Statecharts的C ++状态机框架：复杂系统的视觉形式，这也是UML状态图的基础。与C ++一样，该框架提供了一个基于状态图XML（SCXML）的API和执行模型，以将状态图的元素和语义嵌入QML应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The DelegateChooser is a special Component type intended for those scenarios where a Component is required by a view and used as a delegate. DelegateChooser encapsulates a set of DelegateChoices. These choices are used to determine the delegate that will be instantiated for each item in the model. The selection of the choice is performed based on the value that a model item has for role, and also based on index.
trans-unit.target: DelegateChooser是一种特殊的Component类型，适用于视图需要Component并将其用作委托的那些方案。DelegateChooser封装了一组DelegateChoice。这些选择用于确定将为模型中的每个项目实例化的委托。根据模型项对角色具有的值以及索引来执行选择的选择。

trans-unit.source: The Direct 3D 12 backend is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 目前不支持Direct 3D 12后台。

trans-unit.source: The Direct Approach
trans-unit.target: 直接方法

trans-unit.source: The Direct3D 12 adaptation for Windows 10, both in Win32 (windows platform plugin) and in UWP (winrt platform plugin), is shipped as a dynamically loaded plugin. This adaptation doesn't work on earlier Windows versions. Building this plugin is enabled automatically, whenever the necessary D3D and DXGI develpoment files are present. In practice, this currently means Visual Studio 2015 and newer.
trans-unit.target: 在Win32（ windows 平台插件）和UWP（ winrt 平台插件）中，适用于Windows 10的Direct3D 12适配都作为动态加载的插件提供。这种改编不适用于Windows早期版本。只要存在必要的D3D和DXGI开发文件，就会自动启用构建此插件的功能。实际上，当前意味着Visual Studio 2015及更高版本。

trans-unit.source: The Direct3D 12 adaptation ignores the QSurfaceFormat set on the QQuickWindow or QQuickView, or set via QSurfaceFormat::setDefaultFormat(), with two exceptions: QSurfaceFormat::samples() and QSurfaceFormat::alphaBufferSize() are still taken into account. When the sample value is greater than 1, multisample offscreen render targets will be created with the specified sample count at the maximum supported quality level. The backend automatically performs resolving into the non-multisample swapchain buffers after each frame.
trans-unit.target: Direct3D的12适配忽略QSurfaceFormat该组QQuickWindow或QQuickView通过，或组QSurfaceFormat :: setDefaultFormat）（，有两个例外：QSurfaceFormat ::样品（）和QSurfaceFormat :: alphaBufferSize（）仍考虑。当样本值大于1时，将使用指定的样本数以最大支持的质量级别创建多样本离屏渲染目标。后端在每帧之后自动执行对非多样本交换链缓冲区的解析。

trans-unit.source: The Direct3D 12 adaptation is an alternative renderer for Qt Quick 2 when running on Windows 10, both for Win32 and UWP applications. For more details, see Direct3D 12 Adaptation.
trans-unit.target: Direct3D 12适应程序是在Windows 10上运行的Qt Quick 2的替代渲染器，适用于Win32和UWP应用程序。有关更多详细信息，请参见Direct3D 12 Adaptation。

trans-unit.source: The DropShadow effect blurs the alpha channel of the input, colorizes the result and places it behind the source object to create a soft shadow. The shadow's color can be changed using the color property. The location of the shadow can be changed with the horizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties.
trans-unit.target: DropShadow效果模糊了输入的Alpha通道，使结果着色，并将其放置在源对象的后面以创建柔和的阴影。可以使用color属性更改阴影的颜色。可以使用horizo​​ntalOffset和verticalOffset属性更改阴影的位置。

trans-unit.target: DwmFeatures类型使您能够将玻璃框架扩展到客户端区域,以及控制Aero Peek和Flip3D的行为。

trans-unit.source: The DynamicParameter (previously MapParameter ) type represents a parameter for a Map element, or other elements used in a Map (such as map items, etc.). trans-unit.source: The EchoClient example implements a WebSocket client that sends a message to a WebSocket server and dumps the answer that it gets back. This example should ideally be used with the EchoServer example.

trans-unit.source: The EdgeDetect effect turns smooth, unchanging areas of the scene darker, while areas of the scene with sharp color changes are brightened to highlight the edges.
trans-unit.target: 边缘检测(EdgeDetect)效果将场景中平滑、不变的区域变暗,而场景中颜色变化剧烈的区域则变亮,以突出边缘。

trans-unit.source: The EditorialModel is a read-only model used to fetch editorials related to a Place. Binding a Place via EditorialModel::place initiates an initial fetch of editorials. The model performs fetches incrementally and is intended to be used in conjunction with a View such as a ListView. When the View reaches the last of the editorials currently in the model, a fetch is performed to retrieve more if they are available. The View is automatically updated as the editorials are received. The number of editorials which are fetched at a time is specified by the batchSize property. The total number of editorials available can be accessed via the totalCount property.
trans-unit.target: EditorialModel是一个只读模型，用于获取与Place相关的社论。通过EditorialModel :: place绑定场所将启动对社论的初始获取。该模型以增量方式执行访存，旨在与诸如ListView之类的View结合使用。当“视图”到达模型中当前的最后社论时，将进行取回以检索更多（如果可用）。当收到社论时，视图将自动更新。一次获取的社论数由batchSize属性指定。可以通过totalCount属性访问可用的社论总数。

trans-unit.source: The EditorialModel type provides a model of place editorials. More...
trans-unit.target: EditorialModel类型提供了地方社论的模型。更多的...

trans-unit.source: The Emboss effect replaces each pixel either by a highlight or a shadow, depending on light/dark boundaries on the scene. Low contrast areas are replaced by a gray background. The embossed result represents the rate of color change at each location.

trans-unit.source: The FrameAction provides a way to perform tasks each frame in a synchronized way with the Qt3D backend. This is useful to implement some aspects of application logic and to prototype functionality that can later be folded into an additional Qt3D aspect.

trans-unit.source: The FrameGraph tree should be assigned to the activeFrameGraph property of a QRenderSettings component, itself being a component of the root entity in the Qt 3D scene. This is what makes it the active framegraph for the renderer. Of course, since this is a QML property binding, the active framegraph (or parts of it) can be changed on the fly at runtime. For example, if you want to use different rendering approaches for indoor and outdoor scenes or to enable or disable some special effect.
trans-unit.target: FrameGraph树应该分配给一个QRenderSettings组件的activeFrameGraph属性,它本身就是Qt 3D场景中根实体的一个组件。这样才能使它成为渲染器的活动帧图。当然,因为这是一个QML属性绑定,所以活动帧图(或它的一部分)可以在运行时飞快地改变。例如,如果你想对室内和室外场景使用不同的渲染方法,或者启用或禁用某些特殊效果。

trans-unit.source: The FrustumCamera type provides a PerspectiveCamera where the frustum bounds can be customized. This can be useful for creating asymmetrical frustums.
trans-unit.target: FrustumCamera类型提供了一个PerspectiveCamera，可以在其中自定义视锥范围。这对于创建不对称的平截头体很有用。

trans-unit.source: The FullyDecoded mode is similar to the behavior of the functions returning QString in Qt 4.x, in that every character represents itself and never has any special meaning. This is true even for the percent character ('%'), which should be interpreted to mean a literal percent, not the beginning of a percent-encoded sequence. The same actual character, in all other decoding modes, is represented by the sequence "%25".
trans-unit.target: FullyDecoded模式类似于在Qt 4.x中返回QString的函数的行为，因为每个字符都表示自己，并且从来没有任何特殊含义。即使对于百分号字符（'％'）也是如此，应将其解释为字面的百分号，而不是百分号编码序列的开头。在所有其他解码模式下，相同的实际字符由序列“％25”表示。

trans-unit.source: The GB18030 codec Qt functions were contributed to Qt by James Su <suzhe@gnuchina.org>, <suzhe@turbolinux.com.cn> who pioneered much of GB18030 development on GNU/Linux systems.
trans-unit.target: GB18030编解码器Qt功能由James Su <suzhe@gnuchina.org>，<suzhe@turbolinux.com.cn>贡献给Qt，他率先在GNU / Linux系统上开发了GB18030。

trans-unit.source: The GB18030 codec was contributed to Qt by Anthony Fok <anthony@thizlinux.com>, <foka@debian.org> using a Perl script to generate C++ tables from gb-18030-2000.xml while merging contributions from James Su, Justin Yu and Sean Chen. A copy of the source Perl script is available at http://people.debian.org/~foka/gb18030/gen-qgb18030codec.pl
trans-unit.target: GB18030编解码器由Anthony Fok <anthony@thizlinux.com>，<foka@debian.org>使用QL贡献的Qt，使用Perl脚本从gb-18030-2000.xml生成C ++表，同时合并了James Su和Justin Yu的贡献。和肖恩·陈。可从http://people.debian.org/~foka/gb18030/gen-qgb18030codec.pl获得源Perl脚本的副本。

trans-unit.source: The GB18030 codec was contributed to Qt by Anthony Fok <anthony@thizlinux.com>, <foka@debian.org> using a Perl script to generate C++ tables from gb-18030-2000.xml while merging contributions from James Su, Justin Yu and Sean Chen. A copy of the source Perl script is available at http://people.debian.org/~foka/gb18030/gen-qgb18030codec.pl
trans-unit.target: GB18030编解码器由Anthony Fok <anthony@thizlinux.com>，<foka@debian.org>使用QL贡献的Qt，使用Perl脚本从gb-18030-2000.xml生成C ++表，同时合并了James Su和Justin Yu的贡献。和肖恩·陈。可从http://people.debian.org/~foka/gb18030/gen-qgb18030codec.pl获得源Perl脚本的副本。

trans-unit.source: The Gauge control displays a value within some range along a horizontal or vertical axis. It can be thought of as an extension of ProgressBar, providing tickmarks and labels to provide a visual measurement of the progress.
trans-unit.target: 仪表控件沿水平或垂直轴显示某个范围内的值。可以将其视为ProgressBar的扩展，提供刻度线和标签以直观地查看进度。

trans-unit.source: The GaussianBlur effect blurs all objects in the scene evenly. To keep the effect performant, a large blur amount will not produce a perfectly smooth blur, but rather a mosaic result.
trans-unit.target: 高斯模糊效果使场景中的所有对象均匀模糊。为了保持效果高性能，大模糊量不会产生非常光滑的模糊，而是镶嵌结果。

trans-unit.source: The GaussianBlur effect is simple to use and understand. It blurs all objects in the scene evenly. To keep the effect performant, large blur amount produces a mosaic result instead of smooth blurriness.
trans-unit.target: 高斯模糊效果易于使用和理解。它将场景中的所有对象均匀模糊。为了保持效果良好，较大的模糊量会产生马赛克效果，而不是平滑的模糊度。

trans-unit.source: The GeocodeModel type is used as part of a model/view grouping to match addresses or search strings with geographic locations. How the geographic locations generated are used or displayed is decided by any Views attached to the GeocodeModel (for example a MapItemView or ListView).
trans-unit.target: GeocodeModel类型用作模型/视图分组的一部分，以将地址或搜索字符串与地理位置进行匹配。生成或使用的地理位置的使用方式由与GeocodeModel关联的任何视图（例如MapItemView或ListView）决定。

trans-unit.source: The GeocodeModel type provides support for searching operations related to geographic information. More...
trans-unit.target: GeocodeModel类型为搜索与地理信息有关的操作提供支持。更多的...

trans-unit.target: GeocodingFeatures类型是QFlags <GeocodingFeature> 的typedef 。它存储GeocodingFeature值的OR组合。

trans-unit.source: The Geometry can be used to specify custom geometry used with Qt Quick 3D. The custom geometry should be implemented with C++ and registered to QML.
trans-unit.target: 自定义几何体可以用来指定与Qt Quick 3D一起使用的自定义几何体。自定义几何体应该用C++实现,并注册到QML。

trans-unit.source: The GestureEvent object has the current touch points, which you may choose to interpret as a gesture, and an invokable method to grab the involved points exclusively.
trans-unit.target: GestureEvent对象有当前的触摸点,你可以选择将其解释为手势,还有一个可调用的方法来专门抓取涉及的点。

trans-unit.source: The GestureFlags type is a typedef for QFlags<GestureFlag>. It stores an OR combination of GestureFlag values.
trans-unit.target: GestureFlags类型是QFlags <GestureFlag> 的typedef 。它存储GestureFlag值的OR组合。

trans-unit.source: The Global Object
trans-unit.target: 全局对象

trans-unit.source: The Glow effect blurs the alpha channel of the source and colorizes it with color and places it behind the source, resulting in a halo or glow around the object. The quality of the blurred edge can be controlled using samples and radius and the strength of the glow can be changed using spread.
trans-unit.target: 发光效果会模糊源的Alpha通道，并用颜色对其进行着色，然后将其放置在源的后面，从而在对象周围产生光晕或辉光。可以使用样本和半径来控制模糊边缘的质量，并且可以使用散布来更改发光的强度。

trans-unit.source: The Glucose Feature characteristic is used to describe the supported features of the Server. When read, the Glucose Feature characteristic returns a value that is used by a Client to determine the supported features of the Server.
trans-unit.target: Glucose Feature特性用于描述服务器的支持特性。读取时,Glucose Feature 特性返回一个值,该值被客户端用来确定服务器支持的特性。

trans-unit.source: The Glucose Measurement characteristic is a variable length structure containing a Flags field, a Sequence Number field, a Base Time field and, based upon the contents of the Flags field, may contain a Time Offset field, Glucose Concentration field, Type-Sample Location field and a Sensor Status Annunciation field.
trans-unit.target: 葡萄糖测量特性是一个可变长度的结构,包含一个标志字段、一个序列号字段、一个基准时间字段,根据标志字段的内容,可以包含一个时间偏移字段、葡萄糖浓度字段、类型-样品位置字段和一个传感器状态通知字段。

trans-unit.source: The Gooch lighting model is explained fully in the original Gooch paper. The Gooch model mixes a diffuse object color with a user-provided cool color and warm color to produce the end points of a color ramp that is used to shade the object based upon the cosine of the angle between the vector from the fragment to the light source and the fragment's normal vector. Optionally, a specular highlight can be added on top. The relative contributions to the cool and warm colors by the diffuse color are controlled by the alpha and beta properties respecitvely.
trans-unit.target: Gooch原始模型中对Gooch照明模型进行了详细说明。Gooch模型将漫射对象颜色与用户提供的冷色和暖色混合，以生成色带的端点，该色带用于基于从片段到光线的矢量之间的角度的余弦值来对对象进行着色源和片段的法线向量。（可选）可以在顶部添加镜面高光。漫反射颜色对冷色和暖色的相对贡献分别由alpha和beta属性控制。

trans-unit.source: The Gooch lighting model is explained fully in the original Gooch paper. The Gooch model mixes a diffuse object color with a user-provided cool color and warm color to produce the end points of a color ramp that is used to shade the object based upon the cosine of the angle between the vector from the fragment to the light source and the fragment's normal vector. Optionally, a specular highlight can be added on top. The relative contributions to the cool and warm colors by the diffuse color are controlled by the alpha and beta properties respecitvely.
trans-unit.target: Gooch 原始模型中对Gooch照明模型进行了详细说明。Gooch模型将漫射对象颜色与用户提供的冷色和暖色混合，以生成色带的端点，该色带用于基于从片段到光线的矢量之间的角度的余弦值来对对象进行着色源和片段的法线向量。（可选）可以在顶部添加镜面高光。漫反射颜色对冷色和暖色的相对贡献分别由alpha和beta属性控制。

trans-unit.source: The Gooch lighting model uses both color and brightness to help show the curvature of 3D surfaces. This is often better than models such as Phong that rely purely upon changes in brightness. In situations such as in CAD and CAM applications where photorealism is not a goal, the Gooch shading model in conjunction with some kind of silhouette edge inking is a popular solution.
trans-unit.target: Gooch照明模型同时使用颜色和亮度来帮助显示3D曲面的曲率。这通常比Phong等纯粹依靠亮度变化的模型更好。在CAD和CAM应用中,如果不以逼真为目标,Gooch阴影模型与某种轮廓边缘墨迹相结合是一种流行的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: The GoochMaterial provides a material that implements the Gooch shading model, popular in CAD and CAM applications. More...
trans-unit.target: GoochMaterial提供的材料可实现在CAD和CAM应用程序中流行的Gooch着色模型。更多的...

trans-unit.source: The HBarModelMapper type enables using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A horizontal model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and AbstractBarSeries, so that each row in the data model defines a bar set and each column maps to a category in a bar series. You need to implement the data model and expose it to QML.
trans-unit.target: HBarModelMapper类型允许使用从QAbstractItemModel类派生的数据模型作为图表的数据源。水平模型映射器用于在数据模型和AbstractBarSeries之间创建连接，以便数据模型中的每一行都定义一个条形集，并且每一列都映射到一条条形图中的一个类别。您需要实现数据模型并将其公开给QML。

trans-unit.source: The HBoxPlotModelMapper type enables using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A horizontal model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and a BoxPlotSeries type, so that each row in the data model defines a box-and-whiskers item and each column maps to the range and three median values of the box-and-whiskers item.
trans-unit.target: HBoxPlotModelMapper类型允许使用从QAbstractItemModel类派生的数据模型作为图表的数据源。水平模型映射器用于在数据模型和BoxPlotSeries类型之间创建连接，以便数据模型中的每一行都定义一个盒须项目，并且每一列都映射到该盒的范围和三个中间值-和胡须项目。

trans-unit.source: The IANA IDs and database are also know as the Olson IDs and database, named after their creator.

trans-unit.source: The IANA IDs can and do change on a regular basis, and can vary depending on how recently the host system data was updated. As such you cannot rely on any given ID existing on any host system. You must use availableTimeZoneIds() to determine what IANA IDs are available.
trans-unit.target: IANA ID可以并且确实会定期更改，并且会根据主机系统数据的更新时间而有所不同。因此，您不能依赖任何主机系统上存在的任何给定ID。您必须使用availableTimeZoneIds（）来确定哪些IANA ID可用。

trans-unit.source: The ID is guaranteed to be larger than any other ID in the QWizard so far.

trans-unit.source: The INF files assume a static build of Qt, so no dependencies to other DLLs are listed in the INF files. To distribute an ActiveX server depending on DLLs you must add the dependencies, and provide the library files with the archive.
trans-unit.target: INF文件假定Qt是静态构建的,所以INF文件中没有列出对其他DLL的依赖。要发布一个基于DLL的ActiveX服务器,你必须添加依赖关系,并提供存档的库文件。

trans-unit.source: The INI file format has severe restrictions on the syntax of a key. Qt works around this by using % as an escape character in keys. In addition, if you save a top-level setting (a key with no slashes in it, e.g., "someKey"), it will appear in the INI file's "General" section. To avoid overwriting other keys, if you save something using a key such as "General/someKey", the key will be located in the "%General" section,
trans-unit.target: INI文件格式对密钥的语法有严格的限制。Qt通过使用 % 作为键中的转义字符来解决此问题。另外，如果保存顶级设置（其中没有反斜杠的键，例如“ someKey”），它将显示在INI文件的“常规”部分中。为避免覆盖其他键，如果您使用“ General / someKey”之类的键来保存内容，则该键将位于“％General”部分，

trans-unit.source: The INI file format is a Windows file format that Qt supports on all platforms. In the absence of an INI standard, we try to follow what Microsoft does, with the following exceptions:
trans-unit.target: INI文件格式是一种Windows文件格式,Qt在所有平台上都支持。在没有INI标准的情况下,我们尽量遵循微软的做法,但有以下例外。

trans-unit.source: The INTEGRITY RTOS is widely used in safety- and security-critical systems. Especially in the automotive industry, both Qt and the INTEGRITY RTOS can be used in conjunction with instrument clusters and infotainment systems.
trans-unit.target: INTEGRITY RTOS被广泛应用于安全关键型系统中。特别是在汽车行业,Qt和INTEGRITY RTOS都可以与仪表盘和信息娱乐系统结合使用。

trans-unit.source: The ImageModel is a read-only model used to fetch images related to a Place. Binding a Place via ImageModel::place initiates an initial fetch of images. The model performs fetches incrementally and is intended to be used in conjunction with a View such as a ListView. When the View reaches the last of the images currently in the model, a fetch is performed to retrieve more if they are available. The View is automatically updated as the images are received. The number of images which are fetched at a time is specified by the batchSize property. The total number of images available can be accessed via the totalCount property.
trans-unit.target: ImageModel是一个只读模型，用于获取与Place相关的图像。通过ImageModel :: place绑定Place会初始化图像的初始获取。该模型以增量方式执行访存，旨在与诸如ListView之类的View结合使用。当“视图”到达模型中当前的最后一个图像时，将进行提取以检索更多（如果有）的图像。接收到图像后，视图将自动更新。一次获取的图像数量由batchSize属性指定。可以通过totalCount属性访问可用图像的总数。

trans-unit.source: The Imagine style allows customizing the path that is used to do the image asset selection. The path can be specified for any window or item, and it automatically propagates to children in the same manner as fonts. In the following example, the window and all three radio buttons appear with dark image assets (files that are located in "qrc:/themes/dark").
trans-unit.target: Imagine样式允许自定义用于选择图像资产的路径。可以为任何窗口或项目指定路径，并且该路径会以与fonts相同的方式自动传播到子级。在以下示例中，窗口和所有三个单选按钮均显示为深色图像资源（位于“ qrc：/ themes / dark”中的文件）。

In the following example, the window and all three radio buttons appear with dark image assets (files that are located in "qrc:/themes/dark").

trans-unit.source: The Imagine style is based on image assets. The style comes with a default set of images, but the images can be easily changed by providing a directory with images using a predefined naming convention.
trans-unit.target: Imagine风格是基于图像资产的。该样式自带一组默认的图片,但可以通过使用预定义的命名惯例提供一个包含图片的目录来轻松改变图片。

trans-unit.source: The Imagine style must be separately imported to gain access to the attributes that are specific to the Imagine style. It should be noted that regardless of the references to the Imagine style, the same application code runs with any other style. Imagine-specific attributes only have an effect when the application is run with the Imagine style.
trans-unit.target: Imagine 风格必须单独导入,以获得对 Imagine 风格的特定属性的访问。应该注意的是,无论对Imagine风格的引用是什么,同样的应用程序代码可以用任何其他风格运行。只有当应用程序使用Imagine风格运行时,Imagine特定的属性才会产生效果。

trans-unit.source: The Imagine style supports palette customization via the palette property and the qtquickcontrols2.conf file. As with other styles, the exact palette roles that the Imagine style uses are style-dependent. However, as most of the visual appearance of controls (for example: backgrounds) are managed through image assets, only the roles that are typically used for text will have an effect.
trans-unit.target: Imagine样式通过Palette属性和qtquickcontrols2.conf文件支持调色板自定义。与其他样式一样，Imagine样式使用的确切调色板角色与样式有关。但是，由于控件的大多数视觉外观（例如：背景）都是通过图像资产进行管理的，因此只有通常用于文本的角色才会起作用。

trans-unit.source: The Instantiator element will manage the objects it creates. Those objects are parented to the Instantiator and can also be deleted by the Instantiator if the Instantiator's properties change. Objects can also be destroyed dynamically through other means, and the Instantiator will not recreate them unless the properties of the Instantiator change.
trans-unit.target: Instantiator元素将管理它创建的对象。这些对象是实例器的父级对象,如果实例器的属性发生变化,也可以由实例器删除。对象也可以通过其他方式动态销毁,除非Instantiator的属性发生变化,否则Instantiator不会重新创建这些对象。

trans-unit.source: The IviApplication extension provides a way to associate an IviSurface with a regular Wayland surface. Using the IviSurface interface, the client can identify itself by giving an ivi id, and the compositor can ask the client to resize.

trans-unit.source: The Java style draws CE_CheckBoxIndicator, while QCommonStyle handles CE_CheckboxLabel. We will examine each implementation and start with CE_CheckBoxLabel:
trans-unit.target: Java样式绘制CE_CheckBoxIndicator，而QCommonStyle处理CE_CheckboxLabel。我们将检查每个实现，并从CE_CheckBoxLabel开始：

trans-unit.source: The Java style, as well as all other styles implemented in Qt, does not use PE_FrameButtonBevel. It is usual that a button with a PE_DefaultFrame adjusts the PE_PanelButtonCommand's rectangle by PM_ButtonDefaultIndicator. The CE_PushButtonLabel is found by adjusting the rect by PM_DefaultFrameWidth.
trans-unit.target: Java样式以及在Qt中实现的所有其他样式不使用 PE_FrameButtonBevel 。它是通常与一按钮 PE_DefaultFrame 调节 PE_PanelButtonCommand 通过的矩形 PM_ButtonDefaultIndicator 。通过 CE_PushButtonLabel 调整矩形，可以找到 PM_DefaultFrameWidth 。

trans-unit.source: The Java-style iterators are new in Qt 4 and are the standard ones used in Qt applications. They are more convenient to use than the STL-style iterators, at the price of being slightly less efficient. Their API is modelled on Java's iterator classes.
trans-unit.target: Java 风格的迭代器是 Qt 4 中新增加的,是 Qt 应用程序中使用的标准迭代器。它们比STL风格的迭代器使用起来更方便,但代价是效率略低。它们的API是以Java的迭代器类为模型的。

trans-unit.source: The JavaScript environment provided by QML is stricter than that in a web browser. For example, in QML you cannot add to, or modify, members of the JavaScript global object. In regular JavaScript, it is possible to do this accidentally by using a variable without declaring it. In QML this will throw an exception, so all local variables must be explicitly declared. See JavaScript Environment Restrictions for a complete description of the restrictions on JavaScript code executed from QML.
trans-unit.target: QML提供的JavaScript环境比Web浏览器严格。例如，在QML中，您不能添加或修改JavaScript全局对象的成员。在常规JavaScript中，可以通过使用变量而不声明它来意外地做到这一点。在QML中，这将引发异常，因此必须显式声明所有局部变量。有关从QML执行的JavaScript代码的限制的完整说明，请参见JavaScript环境限制。

trans-unit.source: The JavaScript heap will contain:
trans-unit.target: JavaScript堆将包含:

trans-unit.source: The Joint node is used to build skeletons as part of the skinned mesh support in Qt 3D. A joint can be transformed by way of its scale, rotation and translation properties. Any mesh vertices that are bound to the joint will have their transformations updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 在Qt 3D中,关节节点用于构建骨架,作为皮肤化网格支持的一部分。一个关节可以通过其缩放、旋转和平移属性进行转换。任何绑定到关节的网格顶点都会相应地更新其变换。

trans-unit.source: The Julian calendar gains against the mean tropical year at the rate of one day in 128 years. For the Gregorian calendar, the figure is one day in 3030 years. The difference in the average length of the year between Julian (365.25 days) and Gregorian (365.2425 days) is 0.002%.
trans-unit.target: 儒略历对平均热带年的增益率为每128年1天。对于公历,这个数字是每3030年增加一天。朱利安历(365.25天)和公历(365.2425天)之间的平均年长差异为0.002%。

trans-unit.source: The Julian calendar, proposed by Julius Caesar in 46 BC (708 AUC), was a reform of the Roman calendar. It took effect on 1 January 45 BC (AUC 709), by edict. It was the predominant calendar in the Roman world, most of Europe, and in European settlements in the Americas and elsewhere, until it was refined and gradually replaced by the Gregorian calendar, promulgated in 1582 by Pope Gregory XIII.
trans-unit.target: 公元前46年(公元前708年)凯撒提出的朱利安历,是罗马历法的改革。它于公元前45年1月1日(公历709年)通过诏书生效。它是罗马世界、欧洲大部分地区以及美洲和其他地区欧洲人居住地的主要历法,直到1582年教皇格里高利十三世颁布的格里高利历完善并逐渐取代。

trans-unit.source: The JumpList type enables you to modify Windows Jump Lists.
trans-unit.target: JumpList类型可以让你修改Windows跳转列表。

trans-unit.source: The JumpListCategory type represents a category that consists of several Jump List destinations and has a title.
trans-unit.target: JumpListCategory类型表示一个类别,该类别由多个Jump List目的地组成,并有一个标题。

trans-unit.source: The JumpListDestination type contains a path to a file that users can select from a Jump List to view or edit it with an application.
trans-unit.target: JumpListDestination类型包含一个文件的路径,用户可以从跳转列表中选择一个文件来查看或用应用程序编辑它。

trans-unit.source: The JumpListLink type represents a command to execute an application.
trans-unit.target: JumpListLink类型表示执行应用程序的命令。

trans-unit.source: The JumpListSeparator type represents a separator in a Jump List. This value is used only for task lists.
trans-unit.target: JumpListSeparator类型表示跳转列表中的分隔符。该值仅用于任务列表。

trans-unit.source: The KeyIcon item displays an icon with adjustable color.

trans-unit.source: The Keys attached property can be configured to handle key events before or after the item it is attached to. This makes it possible to intercept events in order to override an item's default behavior, or act as a fallback for keys not handled by the item.

trans-unit.source: The LayerFilter can be configured to select or discard entities with a specific Layer depending on the filterMode property. By default, entities referencing one of the Layer objects that are also being referenced by the LayerFilter are selected (AcceptAnyMatchingLayers).

trans-unit.source: The LayoutMirroring attached property is used to horizontally mirror Item anchors, positioner types (such as Row and Grid) and views (such as GridView and horizontal ListView). Mirroring is a visual change: left anchors become right anchors, and positioner types like Grid and Row reverse the horizontal layout of child items.
trans-unit.target: LayoutMirroring附加属性用于水平镜像Item锚点，定位器类型（例如Row和Grid）和视图（例如GridView和水平ListView）。镜像是一种视觉变化：左定位符变为右定位符，并且诸如Grid和Row之类的定位器类型反转了子项的水平布局。

trans-unit.source: The MIME type database is provided by the freedesktop.org shared-mime-info project. If the MIME type database cannot be found on the system, as is the case on most Windows, macOS, and iOS systems, Qt will use its own copy of it.

trans-unit.source: The MODEL keyword generates special Q_PROPERTY elements for objects derived from QAbstractItemModel. These properties have the same semantics as SOURCEONLYSETTER. The syntax is the MODEL keyword followed by the property name and then parentheses enclosing the (comma-separated) roles that should be exposed to the replica.
trans-unit.target: MODEL关键字为从QAbstractItemModel派生的对象生成特殊的Q_PROPERTY元素。这些属性与SOURCEONLYSETTER具有相同的语义。语法是 MODEL 关键字，后跟属性名称，然后用括号将应公开给副本的（逗号分隔）角色括起来。

trans-unit.source: The MS C++ compiler for .NET on the other hand, can produce both normal and managed code. To write a C++ class that can be compiled into managed code, the developer must flag the class as managed using the __gc keyword, and restrict the code to only use the subset of C++ known as "Managed Extensions for C++", or MC++ for short. The advantage is that MC++ code can freely call and use normal C++ functions and classes. And it also works the other way around: normal C++ code can call managed functions and use managed classes (e.g. the entire .NET framework class library), including managed functions and classes implemented in C# or VB.NET. This feature of mixing managed and normal C++ code immensely eases the interoperability with .NET, and is by Microsoft referred to as the "It Just Works" (IJW) feature.
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，用于.NET的MS C ++编译器可以生成普通代码和托管代码。要编写可编译为托管代码的C ++类，开发人员必须使用 __gc 关键字将该类标记为托管类，并且将代码限制为仅使用C ++的子集，称为“ C ++托管扩展”，或简称为MC ++ 。优点是MC ++代码可以自由调用和使用普通的C ++函数和类。而且它也可以通过其他方式工作：普通的C ++代码可以调用托管函数并使用托管类（例如，整个.NET Framework类库），包括托管函数和以C＃或VB.NET实现的类。混合托管和常规C ++代码的功能极大地简化了与.NET的互操作性，并且被Microsoft称为“ It Just Works”（IJW）功能。

trans-unit.source: The MS compilers for C# and VB.NET will only produce managed code. Such programs cannot directly call normal, native functions or classes.
trans-unit.target: MS的C#和VB.NET编译器只能生成托管代码。这种程序不能直接调用正常的、本机的函数或类。

trans-unit.source: The MSVC and g++ specs targeting Windows enable precompile_header by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，针对Windows的MSVC和g ++规范启用 precompile_header 。

trans-unit.source: The Map type includes support for pinch and flick gestures to control zooming and panning. These are enabled by default, and available at any time by using the gesture object. The actual GestureArea is constructed specially at startup and cannot be replaced or destroyed. Its properties can be altered, however, to control its behavior.
trans-unit.target: 地图类型包括对捏合和轻拂手势的支持，以控制缩放和平移。这些默认情况下处于启用状态，并且随时可以通过使用手势对象来使用。实际的GestureArea是在启动时专门构造的，不能替换或破坏。但是，可以更改其属性以控制其行为。

trans-unit.source: The Map type is used to display a map or image of the Earth, with the capability to also display interactive objects tied to the map's surface.
trans-unit.target: 地图类型用于显示地球的地图或图像,还能显示与地图表面绑定的交互式对象。

trans-unit.source: The MapCircle type displays a geographic circle on a Map, which consists of all points that are within a set distance from one central point. Depending on map projection, a geographic circle may not always be a perfect circle on the screen: for instance, in the Mercator projection, circles become ovoid in shape as they near the poles. To display a perfect screen circle around a point, use a MapQuickItem containing a relevant Qt Quick type instead.
trans-unit.target: MapCircle类型在地图上显示一个地理圆，该地理圆由到一个中心点一定距离内的所有点组成。根据地图的投影，地理圆可能并不总是屏幕上的完美圆：例如，在墨卡托投影中，圆在靠近极点时会变成卵形。要在一个点周围显示完美的屏幕圆圈，请改用包含相关Qt Quick类型的MapQuickItem。

trans-unit.source: The MapCircle type displays a geographic circle on a Map. More...
trans-unit.target: MapCircle类型在地图上显示地理圆。更多的...

trans-unit.target: MapCircleObject在地图上显示一个圆。更多的...

trans-unit.target: MapGestureArea在启用后,必须处理所有传入的触摸事件,以便跟踪 "捏 "的形状和大小。触摸事件上增加的开销可以认为是恒定的时间。

trans-unit.source: The MapPolygon type displays a polygon on a Map, specified in terms of an ordered list of coordinates. For best appearance and results, polygons should be simple (not self-intersecting).
trans-unit.target: MapPolygon类型在地图上显示一个多边形，该多边形是根据坐标的有序列表指定的。为了获得最佳外观和效果，多边形应该简单（不能自相交）。

trans-unit.source: The MapPolyline type displays a polyline on a map, specified in terms of an ordered list of coordinates. The coordinates on the path cannot be directly changed after being added to the Polyline. Instead, copy the path into a var, modify the copy and reassign the copy back to the path.
trans-unit.target: MapPolyline类型在地图上显示多段线，并根据坐标的有序列表进行指定。该坐标的道路上不能被添加到折线后直接更改。而是将路径复制到var中，修改副本，然后将副本重新分配回path。

trans-unit.target: MapPolyline类型在地图上显示折线。更多的...

trans-unit.target: MapPolylineObject在地图上显示折线。更多的...

trans-unit.target: MapPolylineObject在地图上显示折线。仅当包含在Map或MapObjectView中时，MapPolylineObject类型才有意义。

trans-unit.source: The MapQuickItem type is used to place an arbitrary Qt Quick object on a Map at a specified location and size. Compared to floating an item above the Map, a MapQuickItem will follow the panning (and optionally, the zooming) of the Map as if it is on the Map surface.
trans-unit.target: MapQuickItem类型用于将一个任意的Qt Quick对象放置在地图上的指定位置和大小。与浮动在地图上的项目相比,MapQuickItem将跟随地图的平移(以及可选的缩放),就像它在地图表面一样。

trans-unit.source: The MapRectangle type displays a rectangle on a Map. More...
trans-unit.target: MapRectangle类型在地图上显示一个矩形。更多的...

trans-unit.source: The MapRectangle type displays a rectangle on a Map. Rectangles are a special case of Polygon with exactly 4 vertices and 4 "straight" edges. In this case, "straight" means that the top-left point has the same latitude as the top-right point (the top edge), and the bottom-left point has the same latitude as the bottom-right point (the bottom edge). Similarly, the points on the left side have the same longitude, and the points on the right side have the same longitude.
trans-unit.target: MapRectangle类型在地图上显示一个矩形。矩形是多边形的一个特例,它有4个顶点和4条 "直 "边。在这种情况下,"直 "意味着左上角的点与右上角的点(上边)具有相同的纬度,左下角的点与右下角的点(下边)具有相同的纬度。同理,左边的点的经度相同,右边的点的经度也相同。

trans-unit.source: The MapRoute type displays a Route obtained through a RouteModel or other means, on the Map as a Polyline following the path of the Route.
trans-unit.target: MapRoute类型在地图上显示一条通过RouteModel或其他方式获得的路线，并沿着该路线的路径以折线的形式显示。

trans-unit.source: The Material style allows customizing five attributes, theme, primary, accent, foreground, and background.

trans-unit.source: The Material style allows customizing five attributes, theme, primary, accent, foreground, and background.
trans-unit.target: Material样式允许自定义五个属性，主题，主，强调，前景和背景。

trans-unit.source: The Material style also supports a dense variant, where controls like buttons and delegates are smaller in height and use smaller font sizes. It is recommended to use the dense variant on desktop platforms, where a mouse and keyboard allow more precise and flexible user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Material 风格还支持密集变量,其中按钮和委托等控件的高度较小,并使用较小的字体大小。建议在桌面平台上使用密集型变体,因为在桌面平台上,鼠标和键盘可以实现更精确和灵活的用户交互。

trans-unit.source: The Material style in light theme
trans-unit.target: 浅色主题的材质风格

trans-unit.source: The Material style is based on the Google Material Design Guidelines. It allows for a unified experience across platforms and device sizes.
trans-unit.target: 材料样式基于Google材料设计指南。它允许跨平台和设备大小的统一体验。

trans-unit.source: The Material style must be separately imported to gain access to the attributes that are specific to the Material style. It should be noted that regardless of the references to the Material style, the same application code runs with any other style. Material-specific attributes only have an effect when the application is run with the Material style.
trans-unit.target: Material 样式必须单独导入,以获得对 Material 样式的特定属性的访问。应该注意的是,无论对Material风格的引用如何,同样的应用程序代码可以用任何其他风格运行。材质特有的属性只有在应用程序用材质风格运行时才有效果。

trans-unit.source: The Material style's implementation of the custom button imports the Material style, requests a dark theme to get light text, and creates a drop shadow for the background.
trans-unit.target: 材质风格的自定义按钮的实现导入材质风格,请求深色主题获得浅色文字,并为背景创建一个阴影。

trans-unit.source: The Navigation characteristic is a variable length structure containing a Flags field, a Bearing field, a Heading field and, based on the contents of the Flags field.
trans-unit.target: 导航特性是一个可变长度的结构,包含Flags字段、Bearing字段、Heading字段,根据Flags字段的内容。

trans-unit.source: The NavigationFeatures type is a typedef for QFlags<NavigationFeature>. It stores an OR combination of NavigationFeature values.
trans-unit.target: NavigationFeatures类型是QFlags <NavigationFeature> 的typedef 。它存储NavigationFeature值的或组合。

trans-unit.source: The Navigator purpose is to use a plugin's turn-by-turn navigation implementation in a QML application in a seamless manner. This object may take control of the map position, orientation, tilting and zoom, as well as changing the map style, elements on the map such as direction information. In certain cases, it may also restrict user interaction with the Map and with the items on it.
trans-unit.target: 导航器的目的是在QML应用中无缝地使用插件的转盘导航实现。这个对象可以控制地图的位置、方向、倾斜和缩放,以及改变地图样式、地图上的元素(如方向信息)。在某些情况下,它还可以限制用户与地图和地图上的项目的交互。

trans-unit.source: The Navigator type offers functionalities to perform turn-by-turn navigation. More...
trans-unit.target: Navigator类型提供了执行逐行导航的功能。更多...

trans-unit.source: The NdefFilter type is used with the NearField type to read NDEF messages from NFC Forum tags that match a given structure.
trans-unit.target: NdefFilter类型与NearField类型一起使用，以从与给定结构匹配的NFC论坛标签中读取NDEF消息。

trans-unit.source: The NdefMimeRecord type can contain data with an associated MIME type. The data is accessible from the uri in the uri property.
trans-unit.target: NdefMimeRecord类型可以包含具有关联的MIME类型的数据。可从uri属性中的uri访问数据。

trans-unit.source: The NdefRecord type is the base type for all NDEF record types in QML. It contains a single property holding the type of record.
trans-unit.target: NdefRecord类型是QML中所有NDEF记录类型的基础类型。它包含一个持有记录类型的单一属性。

trans-unit.source: The NdefRecord type represents a record in an NDEF message. More...
trans-unit.target: NdefRecord类型表示NDEF消息中的一条记录。更多的...

trans-unit.source: The NdefTextRecord type contains a localized piece of text that can be display to the user. An NDEF message may contain many text records for different locales, it is up to the application to select the most appropriate one to display to the user. The localeMatch property can be used to determine if the text record has been matched.
trans-unit.target: NdefTextRecord类型包含可以显示给用户的本地化文本。NDEF消息可能包含许多针对不同语言环境的文本记录，由应用程序选择最合适的文本记录来显示给用户。该localeMatch属性可以用来确定文本记录已经匹配。

trans-unit.source: The NdefUriRecord type can contain a uniform resource identifier.
trans-unit.target: NdefUriRecord类型可以包含一个统一的资源标识符。

trans-unit.source: The NearField type can be used to read NDEF messages from NFC Forum tags. Set the filter and orderMatch properties to match the required NDEF messages. Once an NDEF message is successfully read from a tag the messageRecords property is updated.
trans-unit.target: NearField类型可用于从NFC论坛标签读取NDEF消息。设置filter和orderMatch属性以匹配所需的NDEF消息。从标签成功读取NDEF消息后，messageRecords属性将更新。

trans-unit.source: The Needle Component
trans-unit.target: 针的成分

trans-unit.source: The Network Access API is a collection of classes for performing common network operations. The API provides an abstraction layer over the specific operations and protocols used (for example, getting and posting data over HTTP), and only exposes classes, functions, and signals for general or high level concepts.
trans-unit.target: 网络访问API是用于执行常见网络操作的类的集合,它为具体的操作和协议(例如,通过HTTP获取和发布数据)提供了抽象层。该API在具体的操作和使用的协议上提供了一个抽象层(例如,通过HTTP获取和发布数据),并且只公开了一般或高级概念的类、函数和信号。

trans-unit.source: The Network Access API is constructed around one QNetworkAccessManager object, which holds the common configuration and settings for the requests it sends. It contains the proxy and cache configuration, as well as the signals related to such issues, and reply signals that can be used to monitor the progress of a network operation. One QNetworkAccessManager instance should be enough for the whole Qt application. Since QNetworkAccessManager is based on QObject, it can only be used from the thread it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 网络访问API围绕一个QNetworkAccessManager对象构造，该对象保存其发送的请求的通用配置和设置。它包含代理和缓存配置，以及与此类问题相关的信号，以及可用于监视网络操作进度的回复信号。一个QNetworkAccessManager实例对于整个Qt应用程序应该足够了。由于QNetworkAccessManager基于QObject，因此只能在其所属的线程中使用。

trans-unit.source: The Network Access API is constructed around one QNetworkAccessManager object, which holds the common configuration and settings for the requests it sends. It contains the proxy and cache configuration, as well as the signals related to such issues, and reply signals that can be used to monitor the progress of a network operation. One QNetworkAccessManager instance should be enough for the whole Qt application. Since QNetworkAccessManager is based on QObject, it can only be used from the thread it belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 网络访问API围绕一个QNetworkAccessManager对象构造，该对象保存其发送的请求的通用配置和设置。它包含代理和缓存配置，以及与此类问题相关的信号，以及可用于监视网络操作进度的回复信号。一个QNetworkAccessManager实例对于整个Qt应用程序应该足够了。由于QNetworkAccessManager基于QObject，因此只能在其所属的线程中使用它。

trans-unit.source: The Node type provides an entry point to a Qt Remote Objects network. A network can be as simple as two nodes, or an arbitrarily complex set of processes and devices.
trans-unit.target: Node类型提供了一个Qt Remote Objects网络的入口点。一个网络可以是简单的两个节点,也可以是一组任意复杂的进程和设备。

trans-unit.source: The Node type serves as the base class for other spatial types, such as, Model, Camera, Light. These objects represent an entity that exists in the 3D scene, due to having a position and other properties in the 3D world. With the exception of the root node(s), all Node types are transformed relative to their parent Node, that is, in local coordinates. In many ways the Node type serves the same purpose in Qt Quick 3D scenes as Item does for Qt Quick scenes.
trans-unit.target: Node类型是其他空间类型（例如Model，Camera和Light）的基类。由于在3D世界中具有位置和其他属性，这些对象表示存在于3D场景中的实体。除根节点外，所有节点类型都相对于其父节点进行转换，即在本地坐标中进行转换。在许多方面，Node类型在Qt Quick 3D场景中的用途与Item在Qt Quick场景中的用途相同。

trans-unit.source: The NodeInstantiator element will manage the objects it creates. Those objects are parented to the Instantiator and can also be deleted by the NodeInstantiator if the NodeInstantiator's properties change. Nodes can also be destroyed dynamically through other means, and the NodeInstantiator will not recreate them unless the properties of the NodeInstantiator change.
trans-unit.target: NodeInstantiator元素将管理它创建的对象。这些对象是实例化器的父级对象,如果NodeInstantiator的属性发生变化,NodeInstantiator也可以删除这些对象。节点也可以通过其他方式动态销毁,除非NodeInstantiator的属性发生变化,否则NodeInstantiator不会重新创建它们。

trans-unit.source: The OpenGL acceleration of series drawing is meant for use cases that need fast drawing of large numbers of points. It is optimized for efficiency, and therefore the series using it lack support for many features available to non-accelerated series:
trans-unit.target: OpenGL系列绘图加速是针对需要快速绘制大量点的用例。它针对效率进行了优化,因此使用它的系列缺乏对非加速系列可用的许多功能的支持。

trans-unit.source: The OpenGL adaptation is the default adaptation, which is capable of providing the full Qt Quick 2 feature set. For more details, see OpenGL Adaptation.
trans-unit.target: OpenGL适应是默认适应，它能够提供完整的Qt Quick 2功能集。有关更多详细信息，请参见OpenGL Adaptation。

trans-unit.source: The OpenGL context can be released to free up graphics resources when the window is obscured, hidden or not rendering. When this happens is implementation specific.
trans-unit.target: 当窗口被遮挡、隐藏或不渲染时,可释放OpenGL上下文以释放图形资源。什么时候发生这种情况是特定的实现。

trans-unit.source: The OpenGL context is still released when the last QQuickWindow is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 删除最后一个QQuickWindow时，仍释放OpenGL上下文。

trans-unit.source: The OpenGL context used for rendering is bound when this function is called.
trans-unit.target: 当此函数被调用时,用于渲染的OpenGL上下文被绑定。

trans-unit.source: The OpenGL context used for rendering the scene graph will be bound at this point.
trans-unit.target: 此时将绑定用于渲染场景图的OpenGL上下文。

trans-unit.source: The OpenGL texture id value that you want Qt3D to gain access to.
trans-unit.target: 你想让Qt3D访问的OpenGL纹理ID值。

trans-unit.source: The OpenGL timer queries objects are queried in sequence to record the GPU timestamps at positions of interest in your rendering code. Once the results for all issues timer queries become available, the results can be fetched and QOpenGLTimerMonitor will calculate the recorded time intervals for you.
trans-unit.target: OpenGL定时器查询对象按顺序查询,以记录您渲染代码中感兴趣的位置的GPU时间戳。一旦所有问题定时器查询的结果可用,就可以获取结果,QOpenGLTimerMonitor将为你计算记录的时间间隔。

trans-unit.target: 附属的OpenGLInfo类型提供了用于渲染附属项表面的OpenGL版本的信息。

trans-unit.source: The OpenGLWindow's context is made current in the destructor, allowing for safe destruction of any child object that may need to release OpenGL resources belonging to the context provided by this window.
trans-unit.target: OpenGLWindow的上下文在destructor中成为当前状态,允许安全销毁任何可能需要释放属于该窗口提供的上下文的OpenGL资源的子对象。

trans-unit.source: The OpenMode type is a typedef for QFlags<OpenModeFlag>. It stores an OR combination of OpenModeFlag values.
trans-unit.target: OpenMode类型是QFlags <OpenModeFlag> 的typedef 。它存储OpenModeFlag值的OR组合。

trans-unit.source: The OpenSSL libraries are looked up first in the directory of the executable, then in the Windows System directory (usually C:\Windows\system32), and finally in all directories listed in the PATH environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 首先在可执行文件的目录中查找OpenSSL库，然后在Windows System目录（通常为 C:\Windows\system32 ）中查找，最后在 PATH 环境变量中列出的所有目录中查找。

trans-unit.source: The OpenStreetMap plugin retrieves the provider's information from a remote repository. This is done to prevent using hardcoded servers by default, which may become unavailable. By default this information is fetched from maps-redirect.qt.io. Setting this parameter changes the provider repository address to a user-specified one, which must contain the files street, satellite, cycle, transit, night-transit, terrain and hiking, each of which must contain valid provider information.
trans-unit.target: OpenStreetMap插件从远程存储库检索提供者的信息。这样做是为了防止默认情况下使用硬编码的服务器，该服务器可能变得不可用。默认情况下，此信息是从maps-redirect.qt.io获取的。设置此参数会将提供者存储库地址更改为用户指定的地址，该地址必须包含 street ， satellite ， cycle ， transit ， night-transit ， terrain 和 hiking ，每个文件都必须包含有效的提供者信息。

trans-unit.source: The Place type has many properties holding information about the location. Details on how to contact the place are available from the contactDetails property. Convenience properties for obtaining the primary phone, fax, email and website are also available.

trans-unit.source: The Place type represents a physical location with additional metadata describing that location. Contrasted with Location, Address, and coordinate type which are used to describe where a location is. The basic properties of a Place are its name and location.
trans-unit.target: 地点类型代表一个物理位置，并带有描述该位置的其他元数据。与用于描述位置的位置，地址和坐标类型相反。地点的基本属性是其名称和位置。

trans-unit.source: The PlaceAttribute type holds generic place attribute information. More...
trans-unit.target: PlaceAttribute类型保存通用的场所属性信息。更多的...

trans-unit.source: The PlaceSearchModel API has some limited support for paging. The nextPage() and previousPage() functions as well as the limit property can be used to access paged search results. When the limit property is set the search result page contains at most limit entries (of type place result). For example, if the backend has 5 search results in total [a,b,c,d,e], and assuming the first page is shown and limit of 3 has been set then a,b,c is returned. The nextPage() would return d,e. The nextPagesAvailable and previousPagesAvailable properties can be used to check for further pages. At the moment the API does not support the means to retrieve the total number of items available from the backed. Note that support for nextPage(), previousPage() and limit can vary according to the plugin.
trans-unit.target: PlaceSearchModel API对分页的支持有限。的下一页（）和|上一页（）函数以及所述限制属性可以被用来访问分页的搜索结果。当极限属性设置搜索结果页面包含至多极限条目（类型为地方结果）。例如，如果后端总共有5个搜索结果[a，b，c，d，e]，并假设显示了第一页并且设置了3个限制，则返回a，b，c。在下一页（）将返回d，E。该nextPagesAvailable和previousPagesAvailable属性可用于检查其他页面。目前，API不支持从支持的项中检索可用项目总数的方法。请注意，对nextPage（），previousPage（）和limit的支持会根据plugin的不同而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: The PlaceSearchModel listens for places that have been updated or removed from its plugin's backend. If it detects that a place has been updated and that place is currently present in the model, then it will call Place::getDetails to refresh the details. If it detects that a place has been removed, then correspondingly the place will be removed from the model if it is currently present.
trans-unit.target: PlaceSearchModel侦听已从其插件的后端更新或删除的位置。如果它检测到某个地点已更新并且该地点当前存在于模型中，则它将调用Place :: getDetails刷新详细信息。如果它检测到某个位置已被删除，则相应地该位置将从当前存在的模型中删除。

trans-unit.source: The PlaceSearchModel returns both sponsored and organic search results. Sponsored search results will have the sponsored role set to true.
trans-unit.target: PlaceSearchModel返回赞助和自然搜索结果。赞助商搜索结果的 sponsored 角色将设置为true。

trans-unit.source: The PlaceSearchSuggestionModel can be used to provide search term suggestions as the user enters their search term. The properties of this model should match that of the PlaceSearchModel, which will be used to perform the actual search query, to ensure that the search suggestion results are relevant.
trans-unit.target: 当用户输入搜索词时，可以使用PlaceSearchSuggestionModel提供搜索词建议。该模型的属性应与PlaceSearchModel的属性匹配，该属性将用于执行实际的搜索查询，以确保搜索建议结果相关。

trans-unit.source: The Places API allows users to discover places of interest and view details about them, such as address and contact information. Some places may have additional content associated with them, such as images and reviews. The Places API also facilitates management of places and categories, allowing users to save and remove them.
trans-unit.target: Places API允许用户发现感兴趣的地方,并查看它们的详细信息,如地址和联系信息。有些地方可能会有与之相关的额外内容,如图片和评论。Places API还便于管理地点和类别,允许用户保存和删除它们。

trans-unit.source: The Places API allows users to discover places/points of interest and view details about them such as address and contact information; some places may even have rich content such as images and reviews. The Places API also facilitates management of places and categories, allowing users to save and remove them.
trans-unit.target: Places API允许用户发现感兴趣的地方/点,并查看有关它们的细节,如地址和联系信息;有些地方甚至可能有丰富的内容,如图片和评论。Places API还便于管理地点和类别,允许用户保存和删除它们。

trans-unit.source: The Places API is currently designed for only saving
trans-unit.target: Places API目前只设计用于保存

trans-unit.source: The Places API only supports saving of the following
trans-unit.target: Places API仅支持以下内容的保存。

trans-unit.source: The Places API supports the concept of favorites. Favorites are generally implemented by using two plugins, the first plugin is typically a read-only source of places (origin plugin) and a second read/write plugin (destination plugin) is used to store places from the origin as favorites.
trans-unit.target: Places API支持收藏夹的概念。Favorites一般通过使用两个插件来实现,第一个插件通常是一个只读的places源(origin插件),第二个读/写插件(destination插件)用来存储来自于origin的places作为favorites。

trans-unit.source: The Places submodule is the natural complement to Positioning, providing a source of geographical data about Places of Interest (POI). Besides the source information, the API provides information about the location, size, and other related information about a POI. The Places API can also retrieve images, reviews, and other content related to a place.
trans-unit.target: Places子模块是定位的自然补充,提供了有关兴趣点(POI)的地理数据源。除了源信息外,API还提供了有关POI的位置、大小和其他相关信息。Places API还可以检索图片、评论和其他与一个地方相关的内容。

trans-unit.source: The PlacesFeatures type is a typedef for QFlags<PlacesFeature>. It stores an OR combination of PlacesFeature values.
trans-unit.target: PlacesFeatures类型是QFlags <PlacesFeature> 的typedef 。它存储PlacesFeature值的OR组合。

trans-unit.source: The PlaneGeometry type is most commonly used internally by the PlaneMesh type but can also be used in custom GeometryRenderer types.
trans-unit.target: PlaneGeometry类型最常在内部由PlaneMesh类型使用，但也可以在自定义GeometryRenderer类型中使用。

trans-unit.source: The Playlist type provides a way to play a list of media with the MediaPlayer, Audio and Video types. It can be used as a data source for view elements (such as ListView) and other elements that interact with model data (such as Repeater). When used as a data model, each playlist item's source URL can be accessed using the source role.
trans-unit.target: 播放列表类型提供了一种使用MediaPlayer，音频和视频类型播放媒体列表的方法。它可以用作视图元素（例如ListView）和与模型数据进行交互的其他元素（例如Repeater）的数据源。当用作数据模型时，可以使用 source 角色访问每个播放列表项的源URL 。

trans-unit.source: The Plugin type describes a Location based services plugin. More...

trans-unit.source: The Plugin type is used to declaratively specify which available GeoServices plugin should be used for various tasks in the Location API. Plugins are used by Map, RouteModel, and GeocodeModel types, as well as a variety of others.
trans-unit.target: 插件类型用于声明性地指定位置API中的各种任务应使用哪个可用的GeoServices插件。Map，RouteModel和GeocodeModel类型以及其他各种类型都使用插件。

trans-unit.source: The PluginParameter object is used to provide a parameter of some kind to a plugin. Typically these parameters contain details like an application token for access to a service, or a proxy server to use for network access, or the serial port to which a serial GPS receiver is connected.
trans-unit.target: PluginParameter对象用于为插件提供某种参数。通常,这些参数包含了一些细节,比如用于访问服务的应用令牌,或者用于网络访问的代理服务器,或者连接串行GPS接收器的串行端口。

trans-unit.source: The Position type has different positional member variables, whose validity can be checked with appropriate validity functions (for example sometimes an update does not have speed or altitude data).

trans-unit.source: The Position type holds values related to geographic location such as a coordinate (longitude, latitude, and altitude), the timestamp when the Position was obtained, the speed at that time, and the accuracy of the data.
trans-unit.target: 位置类型保存与地理位置有关的值，例如坐标（经度，纬度和高度），获得位置时的时间戳，当时的速度以及数据的准确性。

trans-unit.source: The PositionSource type provides information about the user device's current position. The position is available as a Position type, which contains all the standard parameters typically available from GPS and other similar systems, including longitude, latitude, speed and accuracy details.
trans-unit.target: PositionSource类型提供有关用户设备当前位置的信息。该位置可以作为“位置”类型使用，其中包含通常可从GPS和其他类似系统获得的所有标准参数，包括经度，纬度，速度和精度详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The PositionSource type provides the device's current position. More...
trans-unit.target: PositionSource类型提供设备的当前位置。更多的...

trans-unit.source: The Positioning component of the Qt Location API is about the geographical position, size and address of some place. Positioning contains a QGeoCoordinate class, containing latitude, longitude and altitude in meters. QGeoLocation contains a QGeoCoordinate plus address and size information (a bounding box) so that positions can be more than mathematical points. Movement into or out of the defined bounding box areas can be monitored. The API also allows the developer to control the source of the positional information as well.
trans-unit.target: Qt Location API的Positioning组件与某个地方的地理位置，大小和地址有关。定位包含一个QGeoCoordinate类，其中包含以米为单位的纬度，经度和高度。QGeoLocation包含QGeoCoordinate以及地址和大小信息（边界框），因此位置可以大于数学点。可以监视移入或移出定义的边界框区域的过程。该API还允许开发人员控制位置信息的来源。

trans-unit.target: PositioningMethods类型是QFlags <PositioningMethod> 的typedef 。它存储PositioningMethod值的OR组合。

trans-unit.source: The Property Editor always displays properties of the currently selected object on the form.
